class.name: BulletTexture
class.brief_description: A BulletPath useful for simple bullets.
class.description: A BulletPath where the motion is defined with an initial [code]speed[/code] and [code]rotation[/code]. This velocity will be modfied over time using the [code]linear_acceleration[/code] and [code]curve_rate[/code] terms.

members.member: The maximum lifetime of the bullet. If 0.0, bullet will not pop automatically from exceeding it's lifetime.
The speed of the bullet upon spawn. May be negative.
The rate at which the speed of the bullet changes in a second.
The maximium speed the bullet may travel at.
The minimum speed the bullet may travel at. May be negative.
The rotation of the bullet upon spawn in radians
The rate at which the rotation of the bullet changes in radians/second.
